Title: Panda-chan no Koutsuu Anzen
Description: ['A traffic safety film about two pandas named Kan Kan and Lan Lan who live in a quiet animal village in the forest. They go out to the town and learn traffic safety, do good deeds, and return to the forest.']
Related: ['Parent story: Peeping Life: The Perfect Extension', 'Other: Peeping Life: TV Asahi Josei Announcer Collab']
